body: Could you add a `reference_fn` for this and the `no_reduce` (`non_full_loss`) case? See `kldivloss_no_reduce_test` [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3330/files#diff-d89baec73022f5f511c5beb5ce6498dfR3677) for an example
